title: Milk Away
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, International, Organic, Raw, Western, Salad bar, Juice bar, Take-out, Spanish, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. A small place inside an old town house with original Sevillian tiles just a few metres from Cathedral. Offers organic and/or local smoothies, juices, milkshakes, sandwiches, salads all made-in-house in front of you. There is a suggestion board but you can make any combination you like using seasonal ingredients only. There are also gluten and milk free cakes, fair trade snacks, teas, hot belgium chocolate and waffles.
